article_title: United Healthcare, Nation's Largest Insurer, Mostly Dropping Out Of Obamacare
article_text:
Below is a mother grieving the loss of her child. A child who made the ultimate sacrifice protecting your country and providing freedom.

This soldier is Brad Davis, 21, of Garfield Heights. As long as I'm with WTAM 1100, this will serve as a constant reminder to all of us who have done nothing.
